QuantTradr is an initial exploration of the possibilites of backtesting strategies using R and Python. It was done for the Exploratory Visualization class at Columbia University.

QuantTradr Using R & Python to test trading strategies

About

Quantradr is an exploration of using R & Python to build a backtesting system for testing different strategies.

This was done for the Exploratory Data Analysis and Visualization class (stat 4701) at Columbia University in the Spring of 2015 link.

Who

The team members that implemented this project are listed below:

  • Roberto Martin @linkedin
  • Robert Piccone @linkedin
  • Rohan @linkedin
  • Elias Hussen @linkedin

Thanks for reading!
